response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and potential benefits. Given its significance, I propose a purchase price of $950,000 for this product. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic worth of the product and my objective to ensure a reasonable return on investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 950000}
